name: The Ants Are Taking My Food
name_original: The Ants Are Taking My Food
description:
The ants are trying to take your food!

If they manage to take your food it is game over

- Click and Drag the food to move it

- Grab and Shake the food to toss the ants carrying it

- Grab the insecticide to kill the ants. You cannot spray close to the food

Submission for Weekly Game Jam - Week 255

Music from Uppbeat (free for Creators!):
https://uppbeat.io/t/jonny-boyle/funny-in-france 
License code: FIDFS0AODTNF6Z1Q
